dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and danger.

dialogue.speaker: NPC: The Wise Old Man
dialogue.text: Greetings traveler, I sense that you are not from these lands. What brings you to Eldoria?

dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: I'm on a quest to find the legendary Sword of Light, said to be able to vanquish any darkness.

dialogue.speaker: NPC: The Wise Old Man
dialogue.text: A perilous journey indeed. But I sense that you have the heart of a true hero. Take this map, it will lead you to the sword.
